AboutDescription:
I am a Full-Stack Developer & IT Engineer with strong expertise in modern technologies. I am proficient in various programming languages, libraries, and frameworks such as Java, JEE, Spring Boot, Docker, Angular, and React, allowing me to design and develop enterprise-level web applications from frontend to backend. I leverage tools like Swagger, Postman, and Insomnia for API management and testing, and I rely on Git and GitHub for version control and seamless project collaboration. Additionally, my experience with AWS services (S3, RDS, EC2, IAM) enables me to efficiently manage cloud infrastructures. 
 My goal is to collaborate with innovative companies, delivering high-quality, scalable solutions that drive business value and meet clients' specific needs

name: Mohamed Amine Naimi

schoolManagement.title: School Management Application
content: Design and development of a complete school management web application.
Technologies: MERN Stack, Docker, Passport for authentication, Redux for state management.
Setup of Docker containers for easier deployment.

internshipApp.title: Internship Offers Application
content: Design and development of a web and mobile application for internship offers.
Technologies: UML, HTML, CSS, React Bootstrap, JavaScript, MERN Stack.
Authentication management using Passport and state management with Redux.

ecommerceApp.title: E-commerce Application
content: Design and development of an e-commerce application.
Technologies: UML, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Java, Spring Boot, Angular.

educationalSite.title: Educational Website
content: Development of an educational website for students.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL.

gmaoApp.title: GMAO Application
content: Design and development of a maintenance management application (GMAO).
Technologies: UML, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, JSP, MySQL.

avionicsTech.title: Avionics Technician
content: Repair and maintenance of aircraft electronic and electrical systems.
Work on avionic circuits and components.
Analysis and troubleshooting of aircraft electronic systems.
